review.title: “It was full of insights and collaboration.”
review.pros: Pros – Very affable environment, Transparency in the system, proper recognition to good work, good compensation, extremely good location of the office, very convenient and flexible working hours.
review.cons: Cons – during my brief stay as a summer intern I couldn't find any cons at heymath! but if asked to put one I would say that there is a possibility that one may get tired of monotonous work pattern at times.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I believe right now the company is small in size but is growing at a phenomenal pace. I experienced a very satisfactory level of transparency as well as well as conducive environment, it would be a real challenge to maintain it when the company grows in size.

review.title: “You can learn the work but very less opportunities for growth”
review.pros: Pros – The company structure is flat. You can easily reach to the top management.
review.cons: Cons – No promotions. Standard salary hikes.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Salaries are not everything. But they are important.

review.title: “Very enterprising product & good work environment”
review.pros: Pros – Potential of the product developed is huge & good mix of employee talent
review.cons: Cons – Needs more streamlining of process & decision making
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
